author: Rajesh Roy
title: Donald Trump Jr., in India Appearance, Steers Clear of Policy
text:
NEW DELHI—Donald Trump Jr. scrapped plans to give a speech about the shifting global landscape Friday and instead sat for a relaxed onstage interview where he discussed lost business opportunities in India and his changed relationship with his father at a high-profile event in the Indian capital.

The eldest son of the U.S. president spoke at a business conference attended by some of the South Asian nation’s biggest business, entertainment and religious leaders. Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Uber Technologies Inc....
